article_node.title: Napco Security Technologies Earnings Are Imminent; These Most Accurate Analysts Revise Forecasts Ahead Of Earnings Call - NAPCO Security Techs (NASDAQ:NSSC)
article_node.summary: Napco Security Technologies, Inc. is set to release its fourth-quarter financial results on August 25, with analysts predicting earnings of 26 cents per share and revenue of $44.45 million, both lower than the previous year. CEO Richard Soloway has been recognized as a 2025 Security Innovator by Security Business magazine. Recently, Napco's stock rose by 0.7% to close at $30.39, with various analysts maintaining buy ratings while adjusting price targets.
